translations: [数] 等距的；等角的；等轴的；等体积的

sentences.sentence: Sequential isometric contractions can be substituted for weight lifting.
sentences.translation: 连续等距收缩可以取代举重。

sentences.sentence: Which illustrates an isometric view of a common form of roof construction.
sentences.translation: 它展示的是一个普通屋顶结构的轴侧图。
